Class WeatherBureau

    This class represents a weather service that keeps track of all the weather stations.

      void recordDailySummaries​(java.util.Scanner input)
      Takes a Scanner object as a parameter that represents an input data source, such as a file containing a series of daily summary records for one or more weather stations and records rainfall for corresponding station.
      void recordDailySummary​(java.lang.String text)
      Takes a single string representing a single one-line daily weather summary for one day at one weather station.
